original_title: Acting President and new judge appointed to Court of Appeal
original_body_lines: Court of Appeal Judge, Sobitha Rajakaruna has been sworn in as the Acting President of the Court of Appeal before President Ranil Wickremesinghe.
Meanwhile High Court Judge M.C.B. Sanjeeva Morais has taken oath as a Court of Appeal Judge, the President’s Media Division (PMD) reported.
